html.p: You're not really experienced at haggling over the selling price of furs, but you pocket 5 Gold Pieces for the three beaver skins you were given - and you can always use some extra money! Now, will you:

td.a: Buy some extra equipment or food?
Make for the Rudderless Galley tavern, if you haven't already been there?
Leave Rentarn, if you've stayed the night here?
Buy some extra equipment or food?
Make for the Rudderless Galley tavern, if you haven't already been there?
